bug_prediction_metrics.name: AST-based features
bug_prediction_metrics.description: Features extracted from abstract syntax trees (ASTs) to capture both syntax and semantics of source code.

bug_prediction_metrics.name: hyperparameter instability
bug_prediction_metrics.description: A measure of how different hyperparameter settings of a CNN model could generate similar average results for all projects but markedly different results for individual projects or versions.
